categories.name: Hot Takes
prompts: Social media is ruining authentic connection
Everyone should have to work in retail or food service for at least a year
Pineapple on pizza is actually delicious
Cats are better pets than dogs
Morning people are overrated
Tipping culture has gotten out of control
The Oxford comma is absolutely necessary
Cereal is a soup
Die Hard is a Christmas movie
Automatic cars are better than manual transmission
There are too many streaming services now
Iced coffee is better than hot coffee
Books will always be better than audiobooks
Everyone should learn to cook before living alone
Small talk is underrated for building connections
Parallel parking should be part of every driving test
Group projects in school prepare you for real life
Wearing socks with sandals is perfectly fine
The 'reply all' button should be harder to accidentally hit
Movie theaters are overpriced for what you get
Everyone should have to take a personal finance class
Dating apps have made dating worse
Airplane seats should be bigger by law
Reality TV is actually good entertainment
Text messages should have read receipts by default
Subtitles make every movie better
There's nothing wrong with eating the same meal every day
People who don't return shopping carts reveal their true character
Homework in elementary school is unnecessary
Everyone should have to work a customer service job
Karaoke is the best way to bond with people
Buffets are unsanitary and should be banned
People who don't like dogs can't be trusted
Vertical videos should be acceptable everywhere
Everyone should know how to change a tire
Dress codes in offices are outdated
People who are always early are just as annoying as people who are always late
Watching movies alone is better than watching with others
Fountain pens are superior to regular pens
The phrase 'money can't buy happiness' is completely wrong
